title.rendered: “IDF Neutralizes Key Hamas Operative in Lebanon: A Strike Against Global Terror Threats”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has eliminated a central Hamas terrorist in Lebanon; advanced terrorist activities against Israeli targets worldwide.

Earlier today, an aircraft attacked in the Tyre area of Lebanon, striking the terrorist Hadi Ali Mustafa, a central activist in the Hamas terror organization which is part of the overseas sector of the organization.

Hadi was involved in directing sleeper cells and terrorist activities in the region, as well as promoting attacks against Israeli and Jewish targets in various countries around the world. In addition, he served as a leading activist in the organization’s construction department, which was under the control of Samir Pandy, one of Salah al-Arouri’s close associates who was killed along with him.

The IDF and security forces will continue to act against the Hamas terrorist organization in any arena where it operates.

Attached is the documentation of the elimination: https://bit.ly/3TwYeZk
